As you open your door to Christ’s needy and suffering ones, you are welcoming unseen angels. You invite the companionship 
184
of heavenly beings. They bring a sacred atmosphere of joy and peace. They come with praises upon their lips, and an answering strain is heard in heaven. Every deed of mercy makes music there. The Father from His throne numbers the unselfish workers among his most precious treasures.—DA 639.
